title: Where can I get free background music for my short film without violating the copyright rule? - Quora

response.answer_text: The best ways to use free music is to either use the YouTube free royalty free music library (YouTube) or order a track from a composer. If you order a track from a composer please keep in mind that you need a writtern license that the composer authorizes you to use the music in your short film. Alternatively you use use music (paid) from established royalty free music libraries such as Royalty Free Music Library from PremiumBeat.comRoyalty Free Music by The Music Case - Stock Music for ProductionsRoyalty Free Music, Stock Music and Sound Effects from Shockwave-Sound.comHope this helps!
